subject: Negotiation
title: Post-Settlement Settlements
description: Learn Post-Settlement Settlements in one minute.

hook.text: After shaking hands, one negotiator asked: 'Could we make this even better for both of us?'

buildup.text: A post-settlement settlement revisits a done deal to find value both sides missed.

discovery.text: Studies show this uncovers 10-20% more joint value because the pressure is gone.

climax.text: The best time to be creative is right after the handshake, when goodwill peaks.

punchline.text: The deal after the deal is often the best one.

quiz.question: What is a post-settlement settlement?
options: Revisiting a done deal to find extra value for both sides
